documentation.text: @title Base class that provides time overrides, but only if being run in test mode.
@notice Reverts if not running in test mode.
@title Base class that provides time overrides, but only if being run in test mode.
@notice Reverts if not running in test mode.

params._timerAddress: Contract that stores the current time in a testing environment. Must be set to 0x0 for production environments that use live time.

returns._0: uint for the current Testable timestamp.

setCurrentTime(uint256).details: Will revert if not running in test mode.

params.time: timestamp to set current Testable time to.

devdoc.title: Base class that provides time overrides, but only if being run in test mode.

methods.constructor: Constructs the Testable contract. Called by child contracts.

getCurrentTime().notice: Gets the current time. Will return the last time set in `setCurrentTime` if running in test mode. Otherwise, it will return the block timestamp.
